name: Isle of the Conjured
description:
Isle of the Conjured is an action packed adventure through a mysterious island known as Agjuri. Demons refered to as the Conjured Ones are about to invade this world, and it is up to you to stop them. Travel through the island to learn Magic from the many island Sages, and find all the tools and equipment you will need to take the fight to the Conjured beasts. From the deep ocean abyss to the tallest mountain of Agjuri, there is much to explore in this 2-D retro-styled, sidescrolling, platforming action adventure.

FIND COLLECTABLES TO POWER UP

Potions to increase your HP and MP, satchels to increase your inventory space, and emeralds which could certainly help you on your quest can be found scattered throuout the island. Search everywhere!

YOU WILL NEED THE TOOLS OF THE TRADE

From the flashlight which will allow you to see in the dark, to the pair of climbing shoes which will allow you to scale rough surfaces these are the tools that will aid you to traverse the island and find some treasures.

TIME TO GEAR UP

Find various pieces of equipment that will be sure to aid you on your travels, such as the scuba gear which will allow you to stay underwater for an unlimited amount of time, the hazmat suit which will protect you against poisonous atmospheres, to the wingsuit which will allow you to take to the skies, and many more.

MEET THE MANY SAGES OF THE ISLAND AND LEARN FROM THEM

The Sages live all over the island and they each will have a Magic spell for you to learn. Magic can be used to gain access to new areas, defeat certain monsters in one hit, and the most powerful Magic of all will be needed to take the fight to the Conjured Ones.

CHALLENGE THE FLOATING ISLAND OF THE CONJURED

Once you are ready, it will be time to take on the Conjured Ones head on! Many dangers await so be careful!
